Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Psamtekmen with a lappet-wig, a crudely carved face with bulbous eyes and a beard, parallel hands in low relief holding an incised hoe and an adze, a back-pillar inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs runs down the figure, at the back of one arm is an incised seed-basket, the feet rest on a short plinth.
Curator's comments: See also .8925 See also .8927 See also .8928
